review: I ordered the Fire Stick and of course it was after the holiday season so it ran about 5 weeks late...no big deal.  Now that I have used it a few months here is what I am finding.......... Seems there is an error that happens to Amazon's advantage.  For example, I can get Netflix on my computer, but the point of a Fire Stick is to be able to watch it on my TV with a stereo sound or any other movie source.  So I know it is not my internet access and I can get everything else I use wireless without any problem.  I get error messages more often than not when I try to access Netflix.....but no error when I use Amazon movies.  I'm heading over to Best Buy to look for a Roku to see if that makes a difference.
